snippet: Susan G. Komen for the Cure was accused of bowing to right-wing pressure in its decision.
abstract: Susan G Komen for the Cure, the world's largest breast cancer organization, is cutting off its financing of breast cancer screening and education programs run by Planned Parenthood affiliates; Komen foundation cites a longstanding policy prohibiting grants to organizations being investigated by local, state or federal authorities, but Planned Parenthood contends that the foundation is yielding to longstanding pressure from anti-abortion groups.
lead_paragraph: Susan G. Komen for the Cure was accused of bowing to right-wing pressure in its decision.

headline.main: Cancer Group Halts Financing to Planned Parenthood
headline.print_headline: Cancer Group Halts Financing to Planned Parenthood

keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
keywords.name: organizations
